attributes.action: make vets pricing realistic they are overpriced
attributes.additional_details: bring in a pricing plan that is suitable to the public so they can care for there pets on reasonable pricing, vets should have a similar pricing list for medications as our nhs prescription list, people never know if they are going to lose there jobs or there pet suddenly becomes unwell and if not on benefits cannot take them to rspca or pdsa so there only other option is private vet care, i do hope something can be done to force vets into bringing in a proper and fair pricing list
attributes.background: i think vets are extremely overpriced and should have a similar pricing system in line with the nhs suitably bring animal prescription prices down the same as nhs prescriptions more people would be able to then take there pets to the vets instead of giving them up

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual vets.

You might like to sign these petitions

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581142
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564754
